Table: Random Major Spellblights
d10Result
1Eldritch Cataracts
2Nameless Dread
3Negated
4Obsessive Fixation
5Phase Blight
6Spell Burn
7Spell Sap
8Transference Block
9Vertigo
10Roll twice on the minor spellblight chart.The spellcaster is afflicted with both spellblights.
